name: Mad Car Crash Racing Demolition Derby
name_original: Mad Car Crash Racing Demolition Derby
description:
Buckle up your seat belts for the nerve wrecking Demolition Derby. Showoff some speed driving skills in this fiery circuit racing. Dodge the death to become champion of auto world. With 2016 derby race rally; fight for survival. Ramming and crunching the rival cars is your only way to survive. The last one standing at destruction derby win and become champion of road rage challenge.


No one can escape this chaos at car rally 2016. In the epic Demolition Derby unleash your speed driving skills to win derby racing and eliminate opponents. Be the crazy driver in super cool speedway racing and car crash. Stay sturdy at darby arena and become the max speed racer of motor sport champion.


Features:


10 action-packed Top speed racer challenges
Real selling & buying through virtual car dealer
2 different Modes: Survival mode, Race track mode
Massive garage: nitro, damage repair, armored features
Cash to unlock epic demolition derbies
